description: The Passion + Purpose Podcast invites you to discover how you can use your passion for the ultimate purpose—to bring God glory. Hosted by Louie Giglio, bestselling author of Don’t Give the Enemy A Seat At Your Table and Global Pastor of Passion City Church. He invites his friends from diverse spheres of life—scientists, business leaders, pastors, artists and more to spark vision on how listeners can leverage their life for what matters most.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Sadie Huff, Christian Huff, Sadie Robertson Huff)
items.content:
Pastor Louie and Shelley close out this season with a conversation with their good friends, Sadie and Christian Huff. Together, they talk about how to prepare for events like Passion 2024 with purity and humility, anticipating divine interruption, and the unexpected journey of discovering God’s purpose for their lives.

—

ABOUT SADIE AND CHRISTIAN HUFF 

Sadie Robertson Huff is a New York Times bestselling author, speaker, influencer, and founder of Live Original. Communicating as a sister and friend, Sadie and her husband Christian, are on a mission to reach the world with the message of Christ.

—

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is the Pastor of Passion City Church and the Founder of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie recently released Seeing God as a Perfect Father, and is also the author of national-bestsellers including Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table, Goliath Must Fall, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God.

—

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Shelley Giglio, Brad Jones, Misty Paige)
items.content:
Pastor Louie Giglio is joined by three team members who lead the Passion movement: Shelley Giglio, Brad Jones, and Misty Paige. Together, they talk through what it takes to execute large events like Passion 2024 in Mercedes-Benz Stadium. They share about the necessary collision between excellence, faith, and provision. Giving God all the glory, the team reflects on and praises God for all the times that He has done the miraculous for and through the Passion Movement. 

ABOUT THE PASSION MOVEMENT
Rooted in the confession of Isaiah 26:8, Passion exists to glorify God by uniting students in worship, prayer, and justice for spiritual awakening in this generation. Keep up with the Passion Movement at https://passionconferences.com/

—
ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion Movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Since 1997, Passion Conferences has gathered over one million collegiate-aged young people in events across the U.S. and around the world, all under the banner of leveraging their lives for what matters most—the name and renown of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of over a dozen books, including Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table as well as Seeing God as a Perfect Father, Goliath Must Fall, Indescribable: 100 Devotions about God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, and others. Louie and Shelley make their home in Atlanta, Georgia.

—

CONNECT WITH LOUIE GIGLIO

Website: https://www.louiegiglio.com/ 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialLouieGiglio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/louiegiglio/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/louiegiglio

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Jonathan Pokluda)
items.content:
Pastor Louie Giglio sits down with his friend, Pastor Jonathan Pokluda, to reflect on how the weight of God’s glory fell on Passion 2024. They cover everything from the skepticism of Gen Z, to the search for Truth, to the pursuit of passion + purpose, and how Jesus offers a life of deep meaning and delight.
—
ABOUT JONATHAN POKLUDA

Jonathan Pokluda is the lead pastor of Harris Creek Baptist Church in Waco, Texas, and former leader of The Porch, where he saw the ministry grow from 150 to more than 7,000 young adults. The author of the bestselling Welcome to Adulting and Outdated, as well as the Welcome to Adulting Survival Guide and Welcoming the Future Church, Pokluda came to understand the grace of the gospel in his early twenties, which ignited a desire in him to reach people in their twenties and thirties for Christ. He lives with his wife, Monica, and their three children in Waco, TX.
—
Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts, or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

—

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is the Pastor of Passion City Church and the Founder of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie recently released Seeing God as a Perfect Father, and is also the author of national-bestsellers including Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table, Goliath Must Fall, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Christine Caine, Louie Giglio)
items.content:
Do we have eyes to see what God is doing? Or are we missing it, focusing on all the distractions before us? In this talk, Christine Caine reminds us to stop amid the busyness to see how God has never stopped moving in our lives. We can remember what He has done and celebrate it through generations. This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // Isaiah 43:16-18, Exodus 14:21-22, Matthew 9:17

—

Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

—

ABOUT THE PASSION MOVEMENT

PASSION EXISTS TO SEE A GENERATION LEVERAGE THEIR LIVES FOR WHAT MATTERS MOST.

To live in such a way that their journey on earth counts for what is most important in the end. For us at Passion, that’s the fame of the One who rescues and restores, and the privilege we have to amplify His name in everything we do. Learn more at

https://passionconferences.com

items.content:
Does the truth compromise your lifestyle? Jonathan Pokluda presses into the importance of believing the truth (God) that brings us life rather than accepting a lie that will cost us in the form of our death. This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // John 10:4, John 14, Colossians 1:16, John 8:32, Acts 4:10-12

—

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Levi Lusko)
items.content:
Levi Lusko recounts the loss of his daughter Lenya, encouraging those facing tremendous hardship to shift their focus to the wonders of heaven, the weight of glory, the Word of God, and the wounds and worth of Jesus. Our pain produces glory, and our heartbreak leads us to freedom for us and others around us. This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

To read more about Levi Lusko's story, grab a copy of "Through the Eyes of a Lion" here: https://www.levilusko.com/through-the-eyes-of-a-lion

—

VERSES // Romans 8, 2 Corinthians 4:17, 1 Peter 1:24-25

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Sadie Robertson Huff, Sadie Robertson, Sadie Huff, Passion Conferences)
items.content:
Sadie Robertson Huff addresses the desperate need for a generation to know the Word of God. After presenting the Scripture as one complete story, she reminds us that our hardship is evidence of His faithfulness, and the character of who He is in the Word exhibits how real He is. When we face trials, we can be comforted in the generations before us, proclaiming His name and trusting that He is greater than any circumstance we may face.This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // 2 Chronicles 34-35, 2 Kings 22:1-29

—
Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

—

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Passion Conferences)
items.content:
At Passion 2024 Pastor Louie Giglio invites us to shift our eyes to Christ in a world trying to earn righteousness, letting guilt and shame become the narrative, and attempting to control our futures. We can let the pressure fall at the foot of the cross, the only thing able to dwarf our obsession with the world and the only thing with the power to bring us from death to life. This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // Ephesians 2:1-6, John 19:28-37, 2 Corinthians 5:14, Galatians 2:20-21, Galatians 6:13-18

—
Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

—

ABOUT THE PASSION MOVEMENT

PASSION EXISTS TO SEE A GENERATION LEVERAGE THEIR LIVES FOR WHAT MATTERS MOST.

To live in such a way that their journey on earth counts for what is most important in the end. For us at Passion, that’s the fame of the One who rescues and restores, and the privilege we have to amplify His name in everything we do. Learn more at https://passionconferences.com

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is the Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Since 1997, Passion Conferences has gathered over one million collegiate-aged young people in events across the U.S. and around the world, all under the banner of leveraging their lives for what matters most—the name and renown of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of over a dozen books including Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table as well as Seeing God as a Perfect Father, Goliath Must Fall, Indescribable: 100 Devotions about God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, and others. Louie and Shelley make their home in Atlanta, Georgia.

—

CONNECT WITH LOUIE GIGLIO

Website: https://www.louiegiglio.com/ 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialLouieGiglio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/louiegiglio/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/louiegiglio

items.content:
In this talk, Ben Stuart reminds us that sincerity precedes the supernatural. We must stop and ask ourselves if we have a deep desire and hunger to know the King or if we are just seeking the benefits of the kingdom. Do we actually know the Jesus that we claim to love? This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // Mark 13:1-23, John 12:24-26

—

This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.
—
VERSES // Mark 13:1-23, John 12:24-26
—
Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.
—
ABOUT THE PASSION MOVEMENT
PASSION EXISTS TO SEE A GENERATION LEVERAGE THEIR LIVES FOR WHAT MATTERS MOST.
To live in such a way that their journey on earth counts for what is most important in the end. For us at Passion, that’s the fame of the One who rescues and restores, and the privilege we have to amplify His name in everything we do. Learn more at https://passionconferences.com

items.content:
We need to say 'no deal' to the enemy because we've already said yes to the glorious savior, Jesus Christ, and we have given our hearts and lives over to him. Earl McClellan teaches us to avoid the shortcuts we may be tempted to take in life and instead fix our eyes on the Savior for the long haul, giving Him all of us. This talk is from Passion 2024 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA.

—

VERSES // Isaiah 36:1-8, Isaiah 36:14-17, Matthew 4:1-9

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Kristian Stanfill, Brett Younker, Melodie Malone, Passion Music)
items.content:
“If you create space, holy space, God will fill it.” – Louie Giglio

Pastor Louie sits down with Passion Music to discuss all the indescribable ways God moved at Passion 2024 and how they stewarded those holy moments. Kristian Stanfill, Brett Younker, and Melodie Malone share their journey of preparing their hearts to write and carry anthems of worship to the Mercedes Benz Stadium. 

-
Check out Passion Music's new album Call on Heaven
-
ABOUT PASSION MUSIC
Rooted out of the Passion movement, passion music is committed to leading people towards renewed intimacy with God and fresh encounters of worship.
—
Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

—

CONNECT WITH PASSION MUSIC

Instagram: passionmusic  

Facebook: passionmusic  

X: passionmusic  

TikTok:  passionmusicofficial  

Website: https://passionmusic.com/

—

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is the Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Since 1997, Passion Conferences has gathered over one million collegiate-aged young people in events across the U.S. and around the world, all under the banner of leveraging their lives for what matters most—the name and renown of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of over a dozen books including Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table as well as Seeing God as a Perfect Father, Goliath Must Fall, Indescribable: 100 Devotions about God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, and others. Louie and Shelley make their home in Atlanta, Georgia.
—

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialLouieGiglio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/louiegiglio/

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Stan Smith)
items.content:
How do you become the best of the best? How do you leave a legacy? How do you keep the fire burning for the things you’re passionate about? These are just a few of the insights Stan Smith shares in this week’s episode of the Passion + Purpose Podcast. Louie Giglio and Stan Smith sit down to discuss Stan’s journey as a champion athlete, designer, and life-long follower of Jesus. 

Stan Smith is a legendary tennis player, designer, and humanitarian. He was ranked number one in the world in 1967 and 1968, won three Grand Slam singles titles and the Wimbledon in 1972. 
–
MORE ABOUT STAN SMITH 

Stan Smith is a Former World #1, US Open and Wimbledon Champion, designer, and humanitarian.  During his athletic career, he was the number one tennis player in the world. His success on the court inspired the legendary Adidas Stan Smith shoe which has sold over 100 million pairs. He served as the President of the International Tennis Hall of Fame from 2011-2021 and is an active board member for the Boys & Girls Club of Hilton Head Island and the Heritage Classic Foundation. 

–
SUBSCRIBE to our channel to watch more conversations with Louie Giglio on the Passion + Purpose Podcast.


Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

–

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO
Louie Giglio is Pastor of Passion City Church and the Founder of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie recently released Seeing God as a Perfect Father, and is also the author of national-bestseller Don’t Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table, Goliath Must Fall, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, I Am Not But I Know I Am, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God & Science, and The Wonder of Creation: 100 More Devotions About God & Science.

–

How do you become the best of the best? How do you leave a legacy? How do you keep the fire burning for the things you’re passionate about? These are just a few of the insights Stan Smith shares in this week’s episode of the Passion + Purpose Podcast. Louie Giglio and Stan Smith sit down to discuss Stan’s journey as a champion athlete, designer, and life-long follower of Jesus. 
Stan Smith is a legendary tennis player, designer, and humanitarian. He was ranked number one in the world in 1967 and 1968, won three Grand Slam singles titles and the Wimbledon in 1972. 
–MORE ABOUT STAN SMITH 
Stan Smith is a Former World #1, US Open and Wimbledon Champion, designer, and humanitarian.  During his athletic career, he was the number one tennis player in the world. His success on the court inspired the legendary Adidas Stan Smith shoe which has sold over 100 million pairs. He served as the President of the International Tennis Hall of Fame from 2011-2021 and is an active board member for the Boys & Girls Club of Hilton Head Island and the Heritage Classic Foundation.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Lysa TerKeurst)
items.content:
What does it look like to set healthy boundaries with people we love? How can we recognize when there is a need for a boundary in our relationships? How can theology and therapy intersect to help us pursue God’s purposes for our lives? Louie Giglio and Lysa TerKuerst answer all these questions and more in this week's episode of the Passion + Purpose Podcast.

Lysa is a brilliant writer and speaker who has dedicated her life to helping women better know God. She is the president of Proverbs 31 Ministries and the #1 New York Times bestselling author of It’s Not Supposed to Be This Way, Uninvited, The Best Yes, Unglued, Made to Crave, and 18 other books. 
–

MORE ABOUT LYSA 

Lysa TerKeurst is a brilliant Christian author and speaker. She has written more than a dozen books, including the #1 New York Times bestsellers Uninvited: Living Loved When You Feel Less Than, Left Out, and Lonely and Forgiving What You Can't Forget. She is president of Proverbs 31 Ministries, which is a nonprofit dedicated to equip women to deepen their relationship with Jesus. 
–
SUBSCRIBE to our channel to watch more conversations with Louie Giglio on the Passion + Purpose Podcast.


Subscribe to the Passion + Purpose Podcast on YouTube, Apple Podcasts or Google Play to be notified when new episodes arrive.

–

items.content:
On this episode of the Passion and Purpose Podcast, Louie Giglio is joined by long-time friend and brilliant musician, David Crowder. Together, they talk about what inspires Crowder as an artist, and how he continues to bring  fresh expressions of worship to the Church. 

David Crowder is a gifted musician and songwriter who has won countless awards and five grammy nominations. He has written many powerful anthems for the Church including “Come as You Are”, “All My Hope”, and “Good God Almighty”.

–
MORE ABOUT CROWDER
David Crowder is a Christian artist who has dedicated his life to glorifying God through his music. He stepped into the music industry as a student at Baylor where he led worship at local churches and began to write contemporary Christian songs. Over the past 20 years, he has written multiple chart-topping albums and number one songs including “All My Hope”, Good God Almighty”, and “Come as You Are”.
–

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Tony Dungy, Lauren Dungy)
items.content:
On this episode of the Passion and Purpose Podcast, Louie Giglio sits down with Tony and Lauren Dungy to discuss how to utilize your sphere of influence to do good and glorify God. Tony and Lauren share their passion for furthering the Kingdom mission by using what God has given them to bless others and advocate for those in need. 

Tony Dungy is a former NFL coach, sports broadcaster, and bestselling author. Lauren Dungy is the Vice President of the Dungy Family Foundation and is a sought-after speaker and writer. Together they have written titles like Uncommon Marriage, Uncommon Influence, and more.
–
MORE ABOUT TONY AND LAUREN DUNGY 
Tony Dungy is a sports analyst, former football player and head coach of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and Indianapolis Colts. He is also the author of many books including Uncommon, Quiet Strength, and Uncommon influence. 

Lauren Dungy is the Vice President of the Dungy Family Foundation, an organization seeks to meet the physical, educational and spiritual needs of those in their community. She is also the founder and president of the Sisters Book Club and serves on the staff of The Central Tampa Baptist Church.
–

SUBSCRIBE to our channel to watch more conversations with Louie Giglio on the Passion + Purpose Podcast.

items.content:
“If God never did anything else for me, I’d still owe Him my life” – Rick Warren 

In part two of this conversation on the Passion and Purpose Podcast, Pastor Louie Giglio and Pastor Rick Warren discuss the coexistence of purpose and pain and how to leverage your strengths and weaknesses for the glory of God. 

Pastor Rick Warren is the founding pastor of Saddleback Church and best-selling author of The Purpose Driven Life, The Purpose Driven Church, and many other books. 
–

MORE ABOUT RICK WARREN 
Pastor Rick Warren is the founding pastor of Saddleback Church in Lake Forest, California and best-selling author of The Purpose Driven Life, The Purpose Driven Church, and many other books. He has launched multiple ministries with the goal of bringing the truth of the gospel to the whole world.  

–

items.title: Why God’s Faithfulness is the Fuel for Longevity with Rick Warren Pt. 2

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Rick Warren, Louie Giglio)
items.content:
“Pain is the price we pay for usability.” - Rick Warren

To kick off season two of the Passion and Purpose Podcast, Pastor Rick Warren joins Pastor Louie Giglio to recount God’s faithfulness in some of the highest and lowest moments in his life. 

Together, they have a conversation around a wide array of topics, such as the call to ministry, visibility, humility, and deep grief. This conversation is so strong it had to be split into two episodes. Listen to part one now!

–
MORE ABOUT RICK WARREN 
Pastor Rick Warren is the founding pastor of Saddleback Church in Lake Forest, California and best-selling author of the Purpose Driven Life, the Purpose Driven Church, and many other books.  Rick Warren is founder and senior pastor of Saddleback Church in Lake  Forest, California. He is also a bestselling author, known for his popular titles, The Purpose Driven Church and The Purpose Driven Life. He has launched multiple ministries with the goal of bringing the truth of the gospel to the whole world.  

–

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (tim tebow)
items.content:
Tim Tebow rallies us around our collective macro mission, to love the Lord our God with all our heart, soul, mind, and strength, as we faithfully pursue the micro missions that God uniquely designed for each of us. As long as we have breath, we have a purpose.

— 

Passion 2022 was held on January 2-3, 2022 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA. To experience Passion conference for yourself, visit https://passionconferences.com/ 

— 

Subscribe to Passion Conference’s channel to see more messages and videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/passionconferences — 

Check out Passion’s books, music, and more at https://passionresources.com/ 

— 

PASSION EXISTS TO SEE A GENERATION LEVERAGE THEIR LIVES FOR WHAT MATTERS MOST. To live in such a way that their journey on earth counts for what is most important in the end. For us at Passion, that’s the fame of the One who rescues and restores, and the privilege we have to amplify His name in everything we do. 

To stay connected to Passion, follow us on Instagram @passion268: https://www.instagram.com/passion268/ 

— 

Follow Tim Tebow: https://www.instagram.com/timtebow/

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (David Platt)
items.content:
David Platt invites us into the stories of unreached people around the world, pleading with us to refuse to settle for a casual, comfortable, cultural Christianity. Instead, we are challenged to follow Jesus and let His worldwide plan of ransom and rescue dictate everything we think, desire, and do.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Ben Stuart)
items.content:
Ben Stuart tackles the topic of anxiety, reminding us that we were made for one thing—to know, enjoy, and glorify God. Yet, distraction and anxiety can derail us from our God-given destiny. By beginning to understand how to cast our anxieties on Him, we can embrace His Word and leverage every breath to glorify Him. 
—

items.content:
In the final session of Passion 2022, Louie addresses two foundational questions: Who are we? And why are we here? As we come to understand that God is the author and creator of our lives and that we are written into His story rather than our own, we can answer these questions of identity and purpose through Jesus.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio)
items.content:
Louie Giglio introduces the talks from Passion 2022 with the world, calling all of us to live our lives for what matters most: bringing glory to Jesus. 

— 

With Passion City Online, you can join us every Sunday live at 9:30a and 11:45a, and our gatherings are available on-demand starting at 7p! Join us at https://passioncitychurch.com 

— 

Subscribe to our channel to see more messages from Passion City Church: https://www.youtube.com/passioncitychurch1 

— 

Looking for content for your Kids? Subscribe to our Passion Kids Channel: https://passion.link/passionkidsonline 

— 

If you would like to give to our house, visit https://passioncitychurch.com/give/ 

— 

Check out Passion's books, music, and more at https://passionresources.com/ 

— 

At Passion City Church, we believe that because God has displayed the ultimate sacrifice in Jesus, our response to that in worship must be extravagant. It is our privilege, and our created purpose, to reflect God’s Glory to Him through our praise, our sacrifice, and our song. 

— 

Follow Passion City Church: https://www.instagram.com/passioncity/ 

Follow Louie Giglio: https://www.instagram.com/louiegiglio

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Shelley Giglio, Jonathan Sheehan, Misty Paige, Brad Jones)
items.content:
Louie closes out this season of Back to the Benz by sitting down with four other team members who spearhead the Passion Movement: Shelley Giglio, Jonathan Sheehan, Misty Paige and Brad Jones. Together, they talk through what it takes to plan and execute a large stadium event like Passion 2022— zooming in on some of the specifics like choosing the size and location of a venue, and zooming out on things like how to hold the tension between hard work and faith that God will come through.  Rooted in 25 years of event experience, this team gets practical and profound and lays out a strong approach for what it takes to do a stadium event.

—

Passion 2022 was held on January 2-3, 2022 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA. To experience Passion conference for yourself, visit https://passionconferences.com/

— 

Subscribe to Passion Conference’s channel to see more messages and videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/passionconferences

— 

Check out Passion’s books, music, and more at https://passionresources.com/

—

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Levi Lusko)
items.content:
On this episode, Levi Lusko joins Louie as they explore what sets apart great preaching and how young communicators can continue to grow and learn in their craft. Pulling from past experiences of sharing at Passion, Levi walks through some of his process of prepartion and reminds us why stepping outside your comfort zone and trusting God is the best place to be. Throw in some thoughts on space and communion on the moon and it's another incredible conversation as we journey back to the Benz.

—

Pastor Levi Lusko is the Pastor of Fresh Life Church, a best-Selling author, and father of five with his wife Jennie. Learn more about him at levilusko.com

—

Passion 2022 was held on January 2-3, 2022 at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, GA. To experience Passion conference for yourself, visit https://passionconferences.com/

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Christine Caine)
items.content:
As this season of Back to the Benz rolls on, Louie sits down with Christine Caine to talk about fruitful purpose and the power of God that is still at work in this generation. Many of us can get caught looking back at what we’ve walked through, but God in His faithfulness is moving us towards a new day, inviting us into His Story.

—

Learn more about Christine Caine and her newest book, How Did I Get Here?, at christinecaine.com.

items.content:
As Louie continues the road Back to the Benz, he's joined by Ben Stuart, pastor of Passion City Church D.C. Together, they talk about why every seat has life-changing potential at Passion 2022. But why is it important to be in the room? Because as Ben says, if you've only ever heard about Passion, it's similar to the difference between looking at a picture of the Grand Canyon and actually standing at the outer rim. There's more to behold, and the time to gather is now.

—

items.content:
Louie opens up this new, 1.5 season of the Passion and Purpose Podcast with his good friends Sadie and Christian Huff. As Louie and Passion get ready to go "Back to the Benz", each conversation will feature a particular vantage point all geared towards what God is going to do at Passion 2022. In this episode, Sadie and Christian share what makes them so focused on cultivating a fervent faith and why their hearts beat for this generation to prioritize and practice a true, authentic life lived for Jesus.

—

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Jay Wolf, Louie Giglio, Katherine Wolf)
items.content:
Louie and his dear friends, Jay and Katherine Wolf, share hard-won wisdom on how to not only endure suffering but how to thrive and flip our pain into our platform. Filled with practical tips and powerful theology, this conversation will help each of us overcome hurdles and hardship as we learn to lean into God through it all. 

- 

To learn more about Jay and Katherine Wolf or to grab a copy of their newest book, Suffer Strong, visit hopeheals.com.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Jonathan Sheehan)
items.content:
Inspired by the book The Shard by Howard Watson, Louie gets practical on what it looks like to have a great vision that disrupts everything—until that vision becomes what people want to be a part of. Drawn from the life and work of Irvine Sellar, this episode explores the realities of reframing big problems into big possibilities and what it truly costs to create something that will stand the test of time.

-

This talk comes from LIFT 2021—a Creative Collective held by Passion to gather people to learn, grow and be refreshed in your gifts with other creatives without the weight of leading others. To learn more, visit LIFT2022.com.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Dr. Caroline Leaf, Louie Giglio)
items.content: We are hard pressed to go 3 seconds without thinking, so if we aren't aware or willing to take action, our thoughts will end up running our lives. To address this war in our minds, Louie Giglio sits down with Dr. Caroline Leaf to discuss how both science and Scripture point us towards eliminating toxic thoughts and building healthy mental practices.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Shane Kimbrough)
items.content: Louie Giglio is joined by Astronaut Shane Kimbrough, currently the only living American to have flown to space on three different spacecraft. In this conversation, Shane shares strategic ways to pursue big passions with intentionality, skill, and maturity. From Shane's unique vantage point, learn how to launch into your best next step.

items.content: In this episode, Louie sits down with his better half, the one and only Shelley Giglio, for a rewarding and real glimpse into their story, their heartbeat, and their pursuit of the only name that truly matters: Jesus. Shelley gives great clarity around the idea of what it means to worship God and how we can practically and tangibly grow in wisdom as we deepen our pursuit of Jesus.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (KB, Louie Giglio)
items.content: How do you know which opportunities to say yes to and what paths to follow in regards to your gifting and talent? How do you discern the right ways to transform the skills that God has given you into kingdom impact? How do you not let those very talents draw you away and take you out of the local Church, which Jesus calls us to be rooted in and tethered to? Louie talks with chart-topping artist KB on these ideas and much more in this episode of the Passion + Purpose Podcast.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Brad Lomenick, Louie Giglio)
items.content:
On this episode, Louie flips the script and invites good friend and leader Brad Lomenick in for an open interview about life, leadership, and the lessons that Louie has learned along the way. Full of insightful and relatable answers, Louie opens up about why he wrote Don't Give the Enemy a Seat at Your Table and what it has looked like for him to pursue his ultimate passion throughout his ministry. 

-

Brad Lomenick is a leadership consultant, speaker, founder of BLINC, and author of The Catalyst Leader and H3 Leadership. He writes about leadership, the next generation, creativity, innovation, social media, teamwork, and personal growth.

-

Louie Giglio is Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of Don’t Give the Enemy A Seat at Your Table, Not Forsaken, Goliath Must Fall, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God and Science, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, and I Am Not But I Know I Am. Louie and Shelley make their home in Atlanta, Georgia.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Priscilla Shirer)
items.content:
Do you know why you believe what you believe? On this episode of the Passion + Purpose podcast, Louie and his guest Priscilla Shirer spend time talking about why it matters to really understand the Scriptures and to grow in our ability to know God and dwell in His Word. If you're wanting to step on to the front-line that God is specifically calling you to, this episode will help encourage, inspire, and equip you towards that path.

-

Priscilla is mother, wife, author, actress, bible teacher, and the Co-Founder of Going Beyond Ministries, which exists to equip believers through books and Bible study resources. She “considers it a privilege to serve believers from every denomination and culture by helping them to know the truths of Scripture intellectually and encouraging them to experience these truths practically by the power of the Holy Spirit.”

Learn more about Priscilla and Going Beyond Ministries, including her bestselling books, at 

https://www.goingbeyond.com

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Ray Collins, Louie Giglio)
items.content:
Where does inspiration come from and how can you cultivate that creative spark that's uniquely stirring within your heart? How can excellent work and deep passion open doors you never thought possible and lead you down paths you never knew existed? These are just a few of the many insights that Award-Winning Wave Photographer Ray Collins speaks to during Louie's most recent conversation on the Passion + Purpose Podcast.

-

MORE ABOUT RAY COLLINS

Ray Collins is from Thirroul in New South Wales, Australia. He discovered photography in 2007 following a tragic accident that left him unable to walk for several months. His love of the ocean led him to begin photographing his local surfing friends, within a few months he had captured the surfing worldʼs attention by gracing the front covers of several international magazines with his fresh perspective and his willingness to risk his personal safety to get the shot.

A few years later his photography morphed from surfing to waves with the “aim is to show the ocean as a living, breathing thing. To document it in all of it’s intimidating strengths; and to bring awareness to its delicate fragility."

Check out Ray’s work and more of his powerful story over at https://raycollinsphoto.com

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, John Mark Comer)
items.content:
What does it mean to live and lead like Jesus? What is God looking to invest into our souls in these days and who are we becoming that will allow us and the Church to flourish? Louie invites John Mark Comer to a conversation about faith, culture, hurry, joy, and learning to walk with God intimately and intentionally. John Mark Comer is is the founding pastor of Bridgetown Church in Portland, Oregon, a teacher and writer with Practicing the Way, and the bestselling author of The Ruthless Elimination of Hurry among other incredible books.

-

ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO 

Louie Giglio is Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of Don't Give the Enemy A Seat at Your Table, Not Forsaken, Goliath Must Fall, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God and Science, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, and I Am Not But I Know I Am.

items.author: podcast@268generation.com (Louie Giglio, Dr. Charles Stanley)
items.content:
"Obey God and leave all of the consequences to Him." Dr. Charles Stanley has leveraged his life for Jesus and the Kingdom like few others in the last generations. In this first episode of the Passion + Purpose podcast, Louie and Dr. Stanley talk about what it means to be called to ministry, how to endure, and how to continue to walk in Godliness as a church leader, pastor, and student of the gospel. Dr. Charles F. Stanley is the founder of In Touch Ministries and Pastor Emeritus of First Baptist Church of Atlanta, Georgia, where he served more than 50 years. Dr. Stanley's heart's desire is to get the gospel to "as many people as possible, as quickly as possible, as clearly as possible, as irresistibly as possible, through the power of the Holy Spirit to the glory of God." 

-

"Obey God and leave all of the consequences to Him." Dr. Charles Stanley has leveraged his life for Jesus and the Kingdom like few others in the last generations. In this first episode of the Passion + Purpose podcast, Louie and Dr. Stanley talk about what it means to be called to ministry, how to endure, and how to continue to walk in Godliness as a church leader, pastor, and student of the gospel. Dr. Charles F. Stanley is the founder of In Touch Ministries and Pastor Emeritus of First Baptist Church of Atlanta, Georgia, where he served more than 50 years. Dr. Stanley's heart's desire is to get the gospel to "as many people as possible, as quickly as possible, as clearly as possible, as irresistibly as possible, through the power of the Holy Spirit to the glory of God." 
- 
ABOUT LOUIE GIGLIO 
Louie Giglio is Pastor of Passion City Church and the Original Visionary of the Passion movement, which exists to call a generation to leverage their lives for the fame of Jesus. Louie is the national-bestselling author of Don’t Give the Enemy A Seat at Your Table, Not Forsaken, Goliath Must Fall, How Great Is Our God: 100 Indescribable Devotions About God and Science, Indescribable: 100 Devotions About God & Science, The Comeback, The Air I Breathe, and I Am Not But I Know I Am.

He invites his friends from diverse spheres of life—scientists, business leaders, pastors, artists and more to spark vision on how listeners can leverage their life for what matters most.
